parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the arrow head where the index begins at 0

title: IWeldSymbol.GetArrowHeadAtIndex
description: Gets information on the specified arrowhead in this weld symbol.

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the arrow head where the index begins at 0

remarks:
The return value is the following array of doubles :
[
arrowHeadPt
[3],
arrowHeadDir
[3],
arrowHeadWidth
,
arrowHeadHeight
,
arrowHeadStyle
]
where:
arrowHeadPt
[3]
= XYZ arrow head tip location.
arrowHeadDir
[3]
= XYZ arrow head direction.
arrowHeadWidth
= arrow head width where the width is measured along the arrow head direction.
arrowHeadHeight
= arrow head height.
arrowHeadStyle
= arrow head style (that is, open, closed, and so on) as defined in
swArrowStyle_e
.
